name: @cairn/proto
description: Cairn protocol types, constants, and shared definitions

scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run postbuild
scripts.postbuild: mkdir -p dist/mls-wasm/pkg && cp mls-wasm/pkg/mls_wasm.js mls-wasm/pkg/mls_wasm.d.ts mls-wasm/pkg/mls_wasm_bg.wasm dist/mls-wasm/pkg/
scripts.build:wasm: cargo build --manifest-path mls-wasm/Cargo.toml --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && wasm-bindgen mls-wasm/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/mls_wasm.wasm --out-dir mls-wasm/pkg --target web --typescript
